channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Illegal Alien Superintendent’s Voter Registration Docs Deepen Need For Better Vetting
item.description: New records show Ian Roberts, the illegal alien who led public schools, appears to have claimed U.S. citizenship on Maryland voter forms.

item.title: Meet Amar Subramanya, the 46-year-old Google and Microsoft veteran who will now steer Apple’s supremely important AI strategy
item.description: “We are pleased to welcome Amar to Craig’s leadership team and to bring his extraordinary AI expertise to Apple," CEO Tim Cook said in a statement.

item.title: Creedalism Needs Culture
item.description: When it comes to American identity, creedalism and culture aren’t mutually exclusive. Indeed, they must be melded.

item.title: Jeff Bezos and Lauren Sánchez Bezos commit $102.5 million to organizations combatting homelessness across the U.S.: ‘This is just the beginning’
item.description: “It’s a $2 billion commitment,” Sánchez Bezos said. “And we’re going to continue doing it."
